document_scheduler.enabled.description: Enable automatic document processing from research history
document_scheduler.enabled.name: Enable Document Scheduler

document_scheduler.interval_seconds.description: How often to process new research (seconds)
document_scheduler.interval_seconds.name: Processing Interval (seconds)

document_scheduler.download_pdfs.description: Automatically download PDF files during scheduled document processing. Files will be stored on disk (requires storage space). WARNING: Downloaded files are stored unencrypted on disk.
document_scheduler.download_pdfs.name: Auto-Download PDFs (Scheduler)

document_scheduler.extract_text.description: Extract text content to database (minimal space usage)
document_scheduler.extract_text.name: Extract Text to Database

document_scheduler.generate_rag.description: Generate RAG embeddings for semantic search
document_scheduler.generate_rag.name: Generate RAG Embeddings
